Decrease Player Karma
Remove your Karma for a certain price.



Remove 1 PK  Request 1 Glittering Medals.
%action0%


Remove 5 PK  Request 5 Glittering Medal(s).
%action1%


Remove 10 PK  Request 10 Glittering Medal(s).
%action2%


Remove 50 PKs  Request 50 Glittering Medal(s).
%action3%


Remove 100 PKs  Request 100 Glittering Medal(s).
%action4%


Remove All PKs  Request Glittering Medal(s) of how many PKs you have.
%action5%
